article.title: Andromeda Systems to Provide Naval-wide Aviation Software
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Andromeda Systems Inc., Virginia Beach, Va., is being awarded a $7,700,000 ceiling-priced, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the delivery of software tools in support of maintenance planning, scheduling, and execution (MPS&E); the integration of MPS&E software across the Naval Aviation Enterprise; and technical support and maintenance associated with MPS&E software. These software tools originated with the E-6B aircraft and will now be developed for Naval Aviation Enterprise-wide usage. The Naval Air Warfare Center Training Systems Division, Orlando, Fla., is the contracting activity (N61340-13-D-0006).
